name: aureus
description: AureusERP is an open-source enterprise resource planning system with modules for inventory, purchasing, HR, finance, and CRM. It supports self-hosting and aims to provide a customizable, all-in-one business suite.
features: Complete ERP: Inventory, purchasing, HR, finance, and CRM modules. All-in-one business suite.
Inventory Management: Track stock levels and warehouse operations. Never run out.
Financial Accounting: Comprehensive bookkeeping and financial reports. Professional accounting.
Human Resources: Manage employees, payroll, and HR processes. Streamlined HR.
CRM Integration: Customer relationship management built-in. Grow relationships.
Modular Design: Use only the modules your business needs. Flexible implementation.
Customizable: Adapt the system to your business processes. Tailored solution.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your business data. Data sovereignty.
